main: ^Panagbenga festival is celebrated in Baguio City, province of Benguet which is also known as the "Summer Capital of the Philippines" and the "City of Pines".

c-0: ^It is a month-long annual flower occasion in Baguio City. The term is Kankanaey origin, meaning "Season of blooming". It is held in February and was created as a tribute to the city's flowers and as a way to rise from the devastation of the magnitude 7.7 Luzon earthquake on 1990.
